pr_title: TRUNK-5816: Migrate api package tests to Junit5 (BaseModuleActivatorTest)

timeline.message: TRUNK-5816: Migrate api package tests to Junit5 5

replies.bodyText: ModuleActivatorTest and WebModuleActivatorTest are only used internally. So go ahead and switch to JUnit 5
replies.author: dkayiwa
